title: Francia Raisa: ON Getting Rid of Toxic People in Your Life
description: In this week’s episode of On Purpose, Grown-ish star Francia Raisa opens up about what it was like growing up in Hollywood and how she’s been able to keep a level head by relying on her faith.She also shared her tips on overcoming rejection and staying grounded.You will be truly inspired after listening to this conversation!
author: onpurposepodcast@jayshetty.me (Jay Shetty)
